parameters.name: NAME
parameters.description: The name assigned to all of the resources defined in this template.

parameters.name: GIT_REPO_URL
parameters.description: The URL to your GIT repo.

parameters.name: SOURCE_IMAGE_KIND
parameters.description: The 'kind' (type) of the  source image; typically ImageStreamTag, or DockerImage.

parameters.name: SOURCE_IMAGE_NAME
parameters.description: The name of the source image.

parameters.name: SOURCE_IMAGE_TAG
parameters.description: The tag of the source image.

parameters.name: DOTNET_STARTUP_PROJECT
parameters.description: The path to the startup project for the .Net application.

parameters.name: OUTPUT_IMAGE_TAG
parameters.description: The tag given to the built image.

parameters.name: CPU_LIMIT
parameters.description: The resources CPU limit (in cores) for this build.

parameters.name: MEMORY_LIMIT
parameters.description: The resources Memory limit (in Mi, Gi, etc) for this build.

parameters.name: CPU_REQUEST
parameters.description: The resources CPU request (in cores) for this build.

parameters.name: MEMORY_REQUEST
parameters.description: The resources Memory request (in Mi, Gi, etc) for this build.
